about_the_game:
Settling in for a vigorous and lengthy erotic game session you're suddenly whisked away to a fantasy world! Once you regain your bearings, awakened to a visual feast of boobies and butts of sexy monster girls spread out in front of you.

It is revealed that you have been summoned to this strange land for a purpose. Their village is trapped behind a barrier, and with no men inside there is no way to keep the village going. Until you arrived that is!

Rise to the call, become the Monster Girl Breeder and help these poor monster maidens repopulate their village?!

  • Translated version of the original Japanese Visual Novel
  • All the sexy monster girls are fully voiced with their original Japanese dialogue.
  • Original artwork HD upscaled with 16:9 and 4:3 variants.
  • Hours of "plot" to enjoy.
  • Audio including music and special effects.
  • Enhanced with character sprite animations.
  • Gallery and Scene selections.
  • 18 sex scenes full of baby making goodness!

Monster Girl Breeder is the English localization of a Visual Novel originally created by prolific Japanese developer Norn/Miel. We at Cherry Kiss aim to provide an authentic Japanese Visual Novel experience to gamers outside of Japan.

** PLEASE NOTE **
All characters described and visually represented in this game are over 18 years of age, and no actual, nor identifiable minor was used in the production of this game.

highlighted.name: Meet the Cow AND Dog Girl!

content_descriptors.notes: There are scenes in the game that include: nudity, sexual jokes/innuendo, and graphic descriptions of sexual activities.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.6+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Monster Girl Breeder

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound

short_description: You settle in for a gaming session with the latest erotic fantasy game, suddenly you're whisked away to a fantasy world! Waking up in front of a horde of horny monster girls, its up to you to repopulate their isolated village!
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
